description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts typeless damage between 50% and 150% of the user's level, selected at random in increments of 10%.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts damage between 50% and 150% of the user's level.
